dct_description_sm: Covers Old City and environs. Shows street names, religious sites, and other points of interest. Relief shown by hachures. Above upper margin: Guides Joanne. Hachette & Cie. Paris. Below lower marign: Lemercier et Cie. imp. Paris. Includes legend.
dct_publisher_sm: Paris : Hachette & Cie, [approximately 1850] (Paris : Lemercier et Cie)
Paris : Hachette & Cie, [ca. 1850] (Paris : Lemercier et Cie)
